headline: Albemarle upgraded on improved lithium pricing and cost-savings initiatives
summary: Albemarle Corporation (NYSE:ALB, XETRA:AMC) was upgraded to ‘Buy’ from ‘Neutral’ by Bank of America analysts, who also raised their price target on the lithium producer to $190 from $167, citing improving lithium pricing and the company’s ongoing cost initiatives that are expected to drive...

headline: Market Movers: Citi Bullish on NVDA Heading into Earnings
summary: NVIDIA (NASDAQ: NVDA) is sinking today. But with earnings just days away, we do expect to see explosive upside. For one, analysts at Citi just reiterated a buy rating on the tech giant. The firm noted that it’s recommending investors add to NVDA, as the valuation looks attractive and the stock is likely to outperform ... Market Movers: Citi Bullish on NVDA Heading into Earnings

headline: Albemarle Reshapes Lithium Footprint While Targeting Future Profitability And Growth
summary: Albemarle (NYSE:ALB) has idled its Kemerton lithium hydroxide plant in Western Australia, responding to challenging market conditions. The company closed the sale of a major stake in Eurecat and rolled out broad cost controls across its operations. Albemarle received a U.S. Department of Energy grant to restart lithium mining in the United States. The company has returned to year over year revenue growth and revised higher its long term lithium demand forecast. Albemarle, a key global...
